contextId.information: This means that Jesus is not concerned. The negation can modify the verb instead. AT: "you do not care about people's opinions" or "you are not concerned with earning people's favor" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]])
contextId.quote: you care for no one's opinion

contextId.information: This can be stated in positive form. AT: "everyone was afraid" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]])
